headline: Mondelez International (MDLZ) Introduces SOUR PATCH KIDS Strips In Exciting New Format
summary: Mondelez International (MDLZ), known for its broad array of snack offerings, has introduced SOUR PATCH KIDS Strips in new flavors, adding an intriguing dimension to its product portfolio. Despite this product development, Mondelez's share price remained flat over the past week, largely moving in tandem with the broader market's mild fluctuations. While the impactful developments in the tech sector, including Alphabet's record highs, led the S&P 500 and Nasdaq higher, Mondelez's new candy line...

headline: SOUR PATCH KIDS® Introduces New Strips in Five Classic Flavors
summary: The SOUR PATCH KIDS brand is stretching its signature sour-then-sweet experience with the launch of SOUR PATCH KIDS Strips. Featuring five fan-favorite flavors—Lemon, Lime, Orange, Redberry, and Blue Raspberry—SOUR PATCH KIDS Strips delivers the brand's signature taste in a new chewy, ribbon-style format.
